title: Breaking: Dr Mercola deleting every article (25 yrs worth of content) from his website, permanently!
cleaned_text:
Hi there. It’s Erin Elizabeth. I’m here with a big announcement that Dr Mercola is deleting every article he’s ever written from his website of over a quarter century.

He does say, as I mention in the video, that he will put some new articles up for only 48 hours, and then they will also be deleted permanently.

See below how threats many of the 12 of us have received, as well as the team at Mercola and Dr Mercola, are part of the reason for this drastic move.

Watch the video. I’ll update this article soon.
